author: JN9
text: The thing is... I didn't follow Rushia that much because of how busy I am at a moment and I rarely am in her stream and commented stuff. I usually watch shorts and edited videos of her and her scream.  I very much regret this. Rushia is one of the people alongside Matsuri, Fubuki, Pekora, and Haachama who bring me inside the Vtuber rabbit hole. It pretty hit me hard alongside the Russian invasion of Ukraine. I almost have a mental breakdown because of these. But I guess I need to move on.

るしあに出逢えて本当によかった！るしあ大好き。これからもずっとそばに居るよ。

author: トレバーフィリップス
text: るしあちゃんおはよーございます。、そしてこんぬしです。ライブ配信長時間まで本当にお疲れ😃💦様でした。、今回もとっても楽しい､、そして面白い配信をありがとうございました。、100万人達成まことに、おめでとうございます。🎁🎁🎁いや、100万人ですか本当にすごい😆⤴️ですねぇ､次回のライブもとっても楽しみにしてますので､明日の次回のライブ配信も必ず見に行きますので､待機しながらお待ちしています。開催期間になったら必ず、もちろん、見に行きます。、

また機会ある時にじっくり振り返りしよ？恥ずかしがったりツッコミしてるとこも、もっとみたいなw
凸待ちも、沢山の仲間たちがきてるしあちゃん幸せそうでよかった:_きゅん:
めっちゃたのしい企画ありがと！
これからも応援するし、貴女を少しでも支えていきたい。これからも傍にいるからね。
うち達ずっと一緒さ！愛してる:_ハート:

author: Nexcell Pride
text:
I forgot something...

Curiosities:
The Number 3 is also the number which was following her all time...

— Hololive Fantasy is the name for Hololive's 3rd Generation.

— She's the 3rd Member from that generation in reach the million. 

— The day where she reached the Million was 2021 March 3rd
March is the 3rd month of each year and if only counts the 2 last digits from 2021: 2 + 1 = 3

— At entire Hololive, she's the 11th member reaching the Million, and at one roster found at Reddit about Million milestones, she occupies the first from 3rd row, and first from the row plus each digit from 11 are equals to 3
Also, if counting Hololive's official channel, her channel is the 12th channel to reach the million... And again with digits from 12: 1 + 2 = 3
